properties.name: gpcash.server.thread-pool.name
properties.description: Name of the threads for this server thread pool, default is ServerThreadPool

properties.name: gpcash.server.thread-pool.initial-concurrent
properties.description: Initial size of available threads in the pool, default is 5

properties.name: gpcash.server.thread-pool.max-concurrent
properties.description: Maximum size of available threads in the pool, default is 100

properties.name: gpcash.string-block-size
properties.description: Size of each record when a very large string value needs to be broken down
